p: Territory County}ss of Washington of Spokane There being no sheriff, constable or other officer in this precinct able to give the within donation. I hereby empower and authority W.D. Gillespie to serve and be witness my hand this 26th day of June A.D. 1886 J.J.L. Paul Justice of the Peace within & for Spokane Falls Precinct Spokane County, W.T.
